Situated in the heart of Dubai, the project provides proximity to the city's renowned attractions, all within a 10-minute radius.

The project's convenient corner location will allow residents of the complex to enjoy unobstructed views of the marina, canal, and city.

Capital Horizon Terraces is something new in Dubai. This is the future. What should happen to real estate in the near future is a sensible purchase of comfort, not overpaying for a brand.

Follow 3D Tour.

Nestled in the serene Al Marjan Island, the Fortune Bay Residences project is a testament to authenticity and harmony with the surrounding world. Every detail mirrors the natural energy and movement of the mountains, connecting indoor and outdoor spaces with their majestic spirit.

Clean lines, asymmetrical shapes, and natural materials come together in the design, creating a timeless aesthetic. The residences offer a variety of well-considered layouts â from 1-bedroom apartments with a kitchen and integrated dining island, walk-in closet, and dedicated laundry and powder rooms, to 2-bedroom options with either dual ensuites or a maidâs room for added convenience. The spacious 3-bedroom residences offer expansive living areas, ensuite bathrooms, and a dedicated maidâs room, ideal for those seeking both space and privacy.

AMENITIES

  • The 360Â° infinity pool

Residents enjoy a pedestrian-friendly environment with cobbled streets, artisanal cafÃ©s, boutiques, and vibrant public spaces such as the Galleria and Canal Districts. The property offers a variety of options, from compact flex studios to spacious 3-bedroom apartments with flex zones. Additionally, 1- and 2-bedroom apartments are available with diverse layouts and finish levels including standard, executive, premier, and prestige.

Construction completion is scheduled for the 4th quarter of 2028. A key advantage is the exclusive offer of fully furnished apartments with multiple color schemes for all early reservations.

Aspirz By Danube is the ideal choice for those who value a combination of quality, comfort, and attractive conditions in one of Dubaiâs most promising districts.

Binghatti Skyblade by Binghatti rises in Downtown Dubai directly on the Boulevard. The tower presents a minimalist, blade-like silhouette with crystalline glass faÃ§ades and satin-chrome accents. Experience sophistication without frills and comfort without compromise. This place is designed for those who are looking for a harmonious balance between the convenience of urban life and the calm atmosphere of the resort.

Bridging these towers, the podium levels comprise Akalaâs spa and wellness facilities, including an elite club dedicated to enhancing personal performance and wellbeing.

Akalaâs world-class wellness resort allows high-performing professionals to incorporate longevity treatments, biohacking therapies, and recovery programs into their daily routine - without disconnecting from their business commitments.

The twin towers orchestrate a deliberate architectural journey of compression and release, crafting spaces that transition seamlessly from darkness to light, coolness to warmth, and confinement to openness.

While wellness in architecture is a prevalent discussion, Akalaâs design philosophy is rooted in the undeniable truth that architecture profoundly impacts our well-being. Incorporating biophilic elements, technological innovations, and fundamentally reimagining architecture as a therapeutic experience, Akala offers respite from Dubaiâs frenetic energy, a sanctuary from materialism where thoughtful lighting and careful spatial sequencing converge to recalibrate your physical and emotional state.

From spacious one- bedroom units to expansive three-bedroom options, each apartment type has been curated to meet the needs of modern residents. The careful placement of units across the floors ensures that each resident has access to stunning views and maximum privacy.

The Cascades feature a one-of-a-kind facÌ§ade, with a rectangular podium serving as the base. The true architectural play begins from level 1 and extends up to the 16th floor, where each successive floor is slightly smaller, creating the visual impression of the building being constructed like a pyramid. This dynamic design not only offers a mesmerizing shadow play throughout the day but also provides panoramic views for every resident.

The unique stepped design creates a sense of openness and light, with each level tapering inward, offering a sense of exclusivity and refinement that enhances the living experience

With 234 generously allocated parking bays for just 71 units, and valet parking available, The LX ensures tenants, teams, clients, and visitors always arrive with ease. AMENITIES

Set next to the heart of global business in Dubai, Jumeirah Residences Emirates Towers stand as the new architectural icons on the cityâs skyline. From sky pools to Jumeirah Signature Services, each element is designed to elevate the daily experience of discerning residents.

This new landmark rises where success finds its home. Here, ambition is reflected in every line, every service, and every view. Payment plan 60/40

properties.name: Capital One JVC

Trevino, a cascading symphony of luxury residences sets a new standard of opulence; where architecture, nature and luxury converge. A Low-rise Boutique Development nestled amidst townhouses and facing a lush green belt, the development offers residents with serene, panoramic and unobstructed views of nature's canvas along with privacy and a seamless connection to nature. Situated in JVC, Dubai's most coveted and vibrant neighbourhood. It offers relaxed community vibe and seemless connectivity across the city and beyond.

Trevino isnât something you move into â itâs something you move with. A residence that rises gently from the earth, cradled in nature, and carved with purpose. Every line is drawn with restraint. Every space, designed to hold your quiet joys and loudest dreams alike.

Trevino is thoughtfully composed, not just built. With soft tones, graceful lines, and spaces that breathe, it offers quiet elegance for those who find meaning in every moment indoors.

Trevinoâs amenities arenât additions; they are extensions of a design language rooted in grace, rhythm, and rest. Step into a grand lobby where light and shadow compose a welcome. Flow into lush courtyards designed for pause. Rise to rooftop retreats that feel both open and entirely your own.

Residents can expect a range of exclusive facilities, including BBQ areas, kids' play areas, wellness features in the swimming pool, and a Zen garden. The floor plans are meticulously crafted for convenience and comfort, ensuring that each unit feels like a true home.

properties.name: Marquis Vista

properties.name: The Horizon

Veering off the traditional path, Sobha Central holds its innovation in a large urban park on top of its crown jewel - the podium which treats residents to a spectacular view from their homes.

Business center, fitness spaces, shaded green zones, and everyday essentials flow seamlessly into one anotherâcreating a community that feels alive, balanced, and built for the way people live. Every corner is purposefully placed â from the grand prayer hall to the commercial gym, from boutique retail to the supermarket. Whether itâs an early morning spin, a quick game of football, or a serene moment at the meditation room, your routine flows effortlessly through spaces designed for wellness, connection, and pause.

The first beacon rising within the Sobha Central constellation. Perfectly aligned with the core of the Bluewaters & JLT interchange, The Horizon commands unrivalled, panoramic views that stretch effortlessly across the Dubaiâs skyline. With no towers obstructing its gaze for about 500 meters in any direction, it offers a front-row seat to the cityâs spectacular vistas â from serene podium parks to endless horizons beyond. Horizon rises with a distinct advantage in its connectivity within the Sobha Central cluster. Its prime location in Dubai Sports City ensures easy access to major highways and key urban infrastructure. Antalya by Karma is an appealing option for those seeking quality housing or a promising investment opportunity in one of Dubaiâs developing areas.

Artist Hotel will be inviting artists from around the world to create and showcase their work at the hotel. Riviera 49 boasts beautifully landscaped spaces complemented by exclusive beachside living, outdoor dining options, and premium retail outlets.Â 

Residents can enjoy a wealth of amenities including indoor and outdoor playgrounds, as well as convenient services like laundry and car wash. Strategically located at the crossroads of leisure and urban living, Riviera 49 provides easy access to key landmarks while preserving tranquility. This unique community caters to those seeking a dynamic yet peaceful lifestyle, where convenience, comfort, and refinement seamlessly come together, making Riviera 49 the perfect place to call home.

Each unit is fully equipped with high-end appliances, including a cooker, oven, kitchen top, washing machine, and fridge. The apartments also feature spacious terraces and balconies, offering a resort-style living experience.

Situated in one of Dubai's high-demand residential areas, Jumeirah Village Circle, Binghatti Amberhall provides unmatched investment potential. JVC is known for its thriving rental market, offering high returns for investors. The development benefits from easy access to major highways, shopping malls like Circle Mall, and a variety of lifestyle amenities. The combination of luxurious finishes, a prime location, and competitive rental yields make this project an exceptional investment opportunity. The development boasts excellent connectivity to key locations in Dubai, ensuring residents enjoy a perfect blend of urban sophistication and serene waterfront living. Discover Reef 999, an exceptional project located in the coveted Al Furjan community in Dubai. With a focus on luxury living and innovation, Reef 999 is redefining the standards of residential properties in the region.

Investors will find strong growth potential in this development, thanks to the high demand for quality residential properties in the area. Families will appreciate the secure and family-friendly environment that Al Furjan offers, complete with parks, schools, and healthcare facilities nearby.

Residents of Reef 999 will enjoy convenient transport options, with direct access to major highways and the Al Furjan Metro Station (Route 2020), making commuting a breeze. The location is also near key areas like Jebel Ali Village, Discovery Gardens, and Ibn Battuta Mall, ensuring easy access to amenities and entertainment options.

The project stands out for its commitment to excellence, offering high-quality, elegant homes that seamlessly blend innovation with practical solutions. With a focus on creating vibrant, connected communities, Reef 999 provides exceptional value to its residents.

In terms of residential units and payment plans, Reef 999 offers innovative features such as the patented Climate-Controlled Sunken Balcony, adding a unique touch of luxury to the living experience. The project values both luxury and affordability, ensuring that residents receive the best possible living experience for their investment.

Overall, Reef 999 embodies elegance, sophistication, and timelessness in its design and construction. By integrating sustainable practices and green spaces, the project is dedicated to building a greener future for its residents.

The community amenities at Reef 999 are designed to cater to all age groups and interests, with facilities such as swimming pools, jacuzzi, kids play areas, tennis courts, and more, providing a complete lifestyle experience within the development.

Choose Reef 999 for a superior living experience that combines luxury, innovation, and community living. Experience excellence in design and quality, and embrace a vibrant lifestyle in one of Dubai's most sought-after residential projects.

properties.name: Weybridge Gardens 4
properties.description:
Weybridge Gardens 4 enjoys a prime location with excellent accessibility to Dubai's major highways, E311 and E611, offering seamless connections to key destinations such as Downtown Dubai, Dubai Marina, and both city airports. With the addition of the new metro line, residents benefit from effortless connectivity to Dubai's prime locations, making Dubailand a top choice for modern urban living.

Inspired by nature, Weybridge Gardens 4 embodies the theme of blooming with organic, petal-inspired architecture. Its geometric facade reflects biological forms, while integrated lighting along the petal edges enhances its elegance, seamlessly blending exterior and interior. The Building's columnar structures and curved balconies symbolize growth and vitality, seamlessly blending with greenery to reflect nature's harmony. The rooftop, "Rebirth," draws inspiration from water and wood, offering a serene oasis with wellness amenities and breathtaking urban beach views.

Weybridge Gardens 4 features an exclusive sky beach and cascading jacuzzi, inspired by the tranquillity of Tuscanyâs hot springs. With sweeping open views and breathtaking sunsets, this serene retreat crowns the residence, offering a perfect blend of elegance and natural beauty.

Elegant home design creates spaces that seamlessly combine sophistication, functionality, and timeless beauty. It emphasizes balance, harmony, and understated luxury, with every detail thoughtfully curated for both aesthetics and comfort. This approach prioritizes refined materials, cohesive design, and practical layouts that enhance daily living.

Amenities:

  • Infinity rooftop pool
  • Sky beach
  • A Tuscany-inspired cascading jacuzzi
  • Sunbathing lounge with round outdoor daybeds
  • Baja shelf with in-water sunbeds
  • Outdoor shower areas
  • Outdoor seating areas
  • Sunken pool loungers
  • An outdoor cinema
  • A BBQ area

properties.name: Rove Home Dubai Marina
properties.description:
Introducing Rove Home Dubai Marina, a revolutionary residential project that redefines luxury living with innovative amenities and world-class services. Highlighted by Dubai's first-ever convertible indoor infinity pool, residents can enjoy a unique swimming experience that adapts to the seasons - open and breezy in winter, and closed and cozy in summer, all while offering breathtaking views from a height of 165 meters.

The project boasts multi-sensory wellness pods that provide a range of rejuvenating experiences, from ultrashield oxygen treatments to invigorating cold bucket showers. Residents can also indulge in the outdoor semi-Olympic leisure pool, perfect for relaxing swims, daily laps, or lounging in stylish cabanas while taking in panoramic city views.

Fitness enthusiasts will appreciate the boutique fitness studio featuring flagship Crank Ride & Shape studios, blending fitness, fun, and thrill to elevate their workout routines. For social gatherings and events, the multi-purpose hall offers a vibrant indoor and outdoor space that can be easily transformed to accommodate various activities.

Upon entering Rove Home Dubai Marina, residents are greeted by the inviting lobby lounge featuring multi-level seating, reading nooks, co-working spaces, Rove CafÃ©, and more, ensuring a warm and welcoming atmosphere each time they return home. Additionally, the project offers spacious rentable guest rooms, perfect for accommodating visiting friends and family with all the comforts of home.

With an emphasis on personalized service, the entrance and concierge at Rove Home Dubai Marina provide an exceptional welcome experience to residents, adding a touch of hospitality and luxury to everyday living. Experience a new level of residential living at Rove Home Dubai Marina, where innovation, luxury, and comfort converge to create a truly exceptional living environment.

Boasting undulating elevations, lavish interiors, and cutting-edge smart home technology, the Bond Enclave redefines luxury living in Dubai.

The architectural masterpiece of the Bond Enclave transcends ordinary living spaces, showcasing a sculpted facade that exudes sophistication and timeless elegance. Each residence features expansive windows offering breathtaking views, while some units boast wraparound terraces blurring the lines between indoor and outdoor living.

Step into a world of bespoke living at the Bond Enclave, where every aspect is designed to elevate your lifestyle. From elegant kitchens equipped with premium Bosch appliances to tranquil bathrooms featuring exquisite stonework and high-end fixtures, each detail exudes sophistication and refinement.

Beyond the luxurious interiors, residents at the Bond Enclave can enjoy a wealth of premier amenities, including a double-height lobby, a clubhouse, a cinema, a high-performance gymnasium, a lazy river, and an infinity pool. Immerse yourself in a world of meticulously envisioned amenities tailored to transform your everyday experiences.

Located in the vibrant community of Arjan, the Bond Enclave offers unrivaled connectivity to iconic destinations in Dubai, ensuring residents can easily access the best the city has to offer. With world-class experiences at your doorstep and a tranquil sanctuary to call home, the Bond Enclave is a haven of exclusivity reserved for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

properties.name: Guzel Towers
properties.description:
GÃ¼zel Towers, an architectural marvel by Tiger Properties, features twin high-rise towers connected by a stunning central swimming pool. Located in the heart of Jumeirah Village Triangle, this luxurious development combines modern sophistication with serene design, offering residents unparalleled amenities and a lifestyle of elegance.

Step into interiors that blend elegance and comfort seamlessly. Every corner is designed with premium finishes and quality materials. Enjoy modern kitchens, chic bathrooms, and abundant natural light from expansive windows, creating a warm and sophisticated living experience.

properties.description:
Whitecliffs Residences by AG Properties is a remarkable 16-storey development nestled within the prestigious Dubai Islands in Deira. This waterfront gem blends contemporary architectural elegance with the calming allure of beachfront living. Designed to create an unparalleled experience, the sleek structure complements the serene surroundings of the Arabian Gulf, offering residents a sophisticated retreat in one of Dubaiâs most exclusive locales.

Each home boasts carefully curated interiors with high ceilings, abundant natural light, and private balconies that frame stunning views of the Gulfâs azure waters and the iconic Dubai skyline. Situated in the serene yet connected Dubai Islands, Whitecliffs Residences provides effortless access to Dubai Marina, Downtown Dubai, and world-class shopping and dining destinations. Amenities such as a luxurious infinity pool surrounded by cabanas, a fully equipped gym, and a dedicated squash court enhance the living experience. Outdoor spaces, including a barbecue area and family seating zones, create a perfect balance between relaxation and recreation, making this community a true haven for modern living.

properties.name: Azizi Ruby
properties.description: Azizi Ruby is where contemporary living harmonizes with the vibrant lifestyle of Jumeirah Village Circle. Nestled in one of Dubaiâs most popular residential communities, it offers a perfect blend of tranquility and urban convenience. Choose from elegantly designed Studios, 1, 2, or 3-bedroom residences featuring expansive windows and modern interiors. Each home is meticulously crafted with premium finishes, seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor living.

properties.name: LIV Maritime

LIV Maritime, developed by LIV, is a striking 47-story boutique tower located along the beautiful Jumeirah coastline in Dubai. Designed to blend seamlessly with the surrounding natural beauty, the tower boasts a sleek glass exterior and offers stunning views of the Arabian Sea, the Jumeirah Coastline, the Rashid Yachts & Marina, and the iconic Downtown Dubai skyline. The development provides luxurious waterfront living, designed to inspire relaxation and reflection, while offering an energetic connection to the dynamic Dubai city life.

The residences at LIV Maritime feature spacious, open-concept floor plans with 3-meter high floor-to-ceiling windows, allowing natural sunlight to flood the interiors and providing panoramic views. The apartments range from elegantly designed one-bedroom units to expansive duplexes and townhouses. Each home is equipped with smart home technology, premium European kitchens, and luxurious fittings throughout. Residents can enjoy top-of-the-line amenities, including a grand lobby, an oversized pool, fitness areas, and entertainment spaces, all designed to offer a refined and convenient lifestyle.

Located between the bustling metropolitan areas of Downtown Dubai and DIFC, and the serene Jumeirah Coastline, LIV Maritime offers an unparalleled lifestyle. The development is part of a premier waterfront community with easy access to parks, the NEW Dubai Mall by the Sea, and top healthcare facilities. With direct access to the water, including crystal-clear lagoons and stunning beaches, LIV Maritime is the ultimate destination for those seeking a luxurious waterfront lifestyle.

properties.name: MBL Signature
properties.description:
MBL Signature brings luxury living to new heights, offering elegance within every detail, including studios and one- and two-bedroom apartments with breathtaking Markina Skyline views. Located in one of Dubaiâs most sought-after areas, just minutes from the metro and the park, MBL Signature is where your future is brighter and happier, and your apartment is a home you admire.

Experience the cozy comfort and style of our Studio units. Enjoy modern living at its finest. Discover the spacious elegance of our 1 Bedroom units. Skyvue Solair is a flagship project in the esteemed Skyvue cluster by Sobha Realty, known for its unwavering commitment to quality and innovation in the real estate industry. Surrounded by natural light and panoramic views, Skyvue Solair exudes sophistication and epitomizes luxury living. Living at Skyvue Solair is not just about the physical space but also about fostering connections, offering support, and nurturing a true sense of belonging. Situated in the vibrant Jumeirah Village Triangle, ESSENL1FE ensures seamless connectivity to the city while offering a peaceful retreat. properties.name: Arian
properties.description:
Welcome to Azizi Arian, where aspirational living meets endless possibilities in one of the few freehold residential properties within JAFZA. Strategically located in Jebel Ali, the UAEâs flagship integrated business hub, Azizi Arian places you at the heart of the worldâs largest matured free zone and the Middle Eastâs biggest port. This unparalleled location offers seamless connectivity to Dubaiâs prime business, leisure, and retail destinations, supported by outstanding highway and metro access.

Amenities:

  • Swimming Pool
  • Gym

  • Clubhouse
  • Chiller-Free

properties.name: Treppan Tower
properties.description:
Treppan Tower at Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) is a cutting-edge residential project brought to life by Fakhruddin Properties. Comprising 1, 2 bedroom apartments, 3 bedroom duplexes, and sky villas, this modern architectural marvel stands tall with its ground plus 5 podium parking levels and 27 residential floors. Each living space within Treppan Tower is meticulously crafted to harmonize luxury with functionality, boasting automated features, AI-integrated smart home systems, and top-tier furnishings for ultimate convenience. The project goes beyond conventional living standards, prioritizing wellness through advanced air purification systems, mineralized drinking water supply, and cutting-edge technology like robot delivery services and facial recognition access.

Residents at Treppan Tower are treated to a lifestyle of seamless luxury and security, with a dedicated mobile app to control every aspect of their living environment. The tower's leisure floors offer a wealth of amenities such as infinity pools, outdoor theaters, yoga areas, and a unique hydroponic greenhouse cafÃ©, enhancing the overall lifestyle experience.

Representing the future of urban living in Dubai, Treppan Tower embodies a perfect blend of technology, sustainability, and wellness. Its striking faÃ§ade serves as a beacon of modernity and sophistication, setting new standards for contemporary living in the vibrant city.

properties.name: Hotel London
properties.description:
Welcome to the hotel inspired by the city one can never get bored of. Hotel London reflects this dynamic spirit, creating a poetic bridge from the Thames to Dubai, this five-star addition features 96 luxurious rooms, inviting guests to experience a rather elegant action-packed stay with a wraparound rooftop infinity pool overlooking the Dubai skyline, classic tearooms, a sophisticated English pub in a contemporary setting as well as a 500 people ballroom for events that aim to make a mark in the Dubai calendar.

Additionally, the boutique hotel embraces eco-friendly innovations, incorporating solar energy, waste-free systems and other sustainable technologies to honor Londonâs heritage with a modern vision.

properties.name: The Hillgate
properties.description:
Welcome to The Hillgate, where every space is crafted to reflect the diversity of modern lifestyles. From sleek studios to expansive 4-bedroom layouts, each residence offers more than just a home â itâs a place where thoughtful design meets elevated comfort. Bathed in natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, interiors feature rich textures and fine finishes that create a lasting impression. Embark on a bold new chapter of refined elegance in Dubai Silicon Oasis with our latest residential masterpiece, The Hillgate. Where modern life seamlessly blends with community-centric design, The Hillgate offers an inspired home crafted for those who value style and practicality.

properties.name: Amazonia
properties.description:
The residential building "Amazonia" from Palladium Development is not just a living space; it is a place where everyone can find comfort and tranquility. Amazonia embodies the dream of living in the ideal Al Jaddaf area, near the Dubai Creek canal. The Business Bay area is just 10 minutes away, and also nearby is the largest shopping center, Dubai Mall, in the Downtown area, which can be reached in 10 minutes by metro located near the building. The Al Jaddaf region combines the tranquility of green spaces with the dynamics of business infrastructure.

Strolling along the Dubai Creek water canal will fill each day with freshness, while a unique waterfall descending from the upper floor of the building in real time will create an atmosphere of relaxation and rest. Our goal is to provide residents with a harmonious space where everyone can spend time with family or friends.

Comfortable one-bedroom and two-bedroom apartments with thoughtful layouts and modern finishes meet the highest standards. Luxurious high-quality furniture adds sophistication and coziness, creating the perfect living environment.

Three-bedroom apartments on the upper floors will allow you to enjoy unparalleled panoramic views, making every moment unique. The apartments in the "Amazonia" project from Palladium Development feature a smart home management system, giving each owner the opportunity to make the most of modern technologies and innovations.

The commercial infrastructure of the area allows residents to access all necessary services within walking distance. Shops, cafes, and sports facilities provide variety for an active lifestyle. An abundance of walking paths and areas allows residents to enjoy their time near home, surrounded by parks. Additionally, the Al Jaddaf area has many educational schools, private kindergartens, and sports centers for children's development and education. The balance between family leisure and the convenience of urban life makes this project truly unique.

Furthermore, the transport system of the area ensures proximity to the city's famous attractions, all of which are within a 15-minute radius. Nearby convenient access to Al Khail Road allows for optimal route selection. The Al Jaddaf area is rapidly developing in all directions and has been purposefully chosen by the developer Palladium Development to create a unique project called "Amazonia," where each resident can experience the urban metropolis while simultaneously enjoying the tropical atmosphere characteristic of the Amazon rainforest. At Palladium, we strive to create projects that meet the needs of our clients by developing comfortable and technologically advanced living spaces.

properties.name: Binghatti Starlight

Binghatti Starlight is a striking residential development that represents the perfect harmony between architectural brilliance and luxury living. The building's hexagonal, star-like facade creates a dynamic interplay of light and shadow, adding to its distinctive visual appeal. With a total of 20 residential floors, Binghatti Starlight offers a variety of high-end living options, making it a truly iconic landmark in the city.

The residences at Binghatti Starlight are designed to offer the utmost in comfort and style. The development features a range of apartments, including studios, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom units, each thoughtfully crafted with contemporary finishes and spacious interiors. The apartments are designed with an emphasis on functionality, combining modern aesthetics with practical layouts. Residents can enjoy stylish kitchens, sleek bathrooms, and generous living spaces that provide a perfect setting for both relaxation and socializing.

Located in the heart of Dubai, Binghatti Starlight provides residents with access to the city's top attractions, business districts, and recreational facilities. The development is surrounded by key landmarks such as Dubai Mall, Dubai Marina, and Palm Jumeirah, ensuring that residents are never far from the excitement and convenience Dubai offers. Binghatti Starlight also features community amenities that encourage a balanced and active lifestyle, such as fitness centers, swimming pools, and landscaped outdoor spaces.

Designed with a concrete structure, the tower features a mix of internal and external finishes. The apartments at Forest City Tower offer a variety of layouts, from studios to one, two, and three-bedroom units, with sizes ranging from spacious to compact. Each apartment is fully furnished, designed with high-quality finishes, modern kitchens, and ample storage spaces. The layouts provide open-plan designs that create seamless living areas, designed to offer a serene atmosphere throughout. Residents can enjoy stunning views from the comfort of their balconies, and the apartments are equipped with all the amenities needed for modern living, including a fitness studio, wellness center, and a BBQ area.

Located in the heart of Majan, Forest City Tower provides exceptional connectivity to key destinations in Dubai, including Downtown, Dubai Marina, and other top attractions. With a plethora of shopping and entertainment options nearby, the location ensures that residents can enjoy both a vibrant urban lifestyle and a tranquil living environment. This project offers not just a home but a smart investment for the future, with growing demand for residential spaces in this area, ensuring long-term value and rental potential.

properties.name: Empire Lakeviews
properties.description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Liwan, between the thriving Dubai Silicon Oasis and the serene academic hub of Academic City. Empire Lakeviews seamlessly combines the dynamic energy of urban living with the calm ambiance of educational surroundings. With innovation hubs and bustling industrial zones nearby, residents can enjoy unparalleled access to essential amenities, embracing a balanced lifestyle in one of Dubaiâs most forward-thinking landscapes.

properties.name: Sunset Bay

Located on serene and lively islands, this exclusive complex boasts an 8-storey facade with a basement and two podiums, creating a lifestyle in which tranquility is organically combined with urban sophistication.

Upon entering the complex, you are greeted by an atmosphere of exquisite luxury. The interiors are decorated with high-quality plumbing fixtures, elegant decor elements and meticulous attention to detail, which ensures that every aspect of your home will radiate sophistication. The floor-to-ceiling windows offer breathtaking views of the surrounding paradise island, flooding your living space with natural light and offering panoramic views of the sunlit waters and bright sunsets.

The complex is designed for those who want to spend time like in a resort, with easy access to private beaches and marinas located just a few minutes away. Whether you decide to relax on a private beach, take a leisurely stroll along the marina or immerse yourself in the vibrant social life of the island, every moment here is an invitation to experience all the most beautiful things in life.

properties.name: Binghatti Pinnacle

The configuration is 4B + G + 16 residential floors plus a roof, planned as a residential-and-retail address with convenient city access. Architecture follows Binghattiâs dynamic style focused on clarity, proportion, and light.

Apartments comprise 1BR, 2BR, and 3BR layouts with open-plan living, practical storage, and well-finished kitchens and bathrooms. Selected floor plans provide generous balconies that extend the living area and frame city views. Interior palettes balance stone, wood veneers, ceramics, and mirrored accents for a clean, modern feel.

Residents enjoy an infinity pool with a separate kidsâ pool, a landscaped leisure terrace, and an indoor gym with dedicated zones. Everyday convenience is enhanced by podium retail and parking. Under the âLiving Binghatti Styleâ program, on-site services include property management, unit resale support, parking sale services, holiday homes, annual maintenance, and furniture packages.

This development is ideal for those seeking a balance of city living and a more relaxed, family-friendly atmosphere, with nearby parks, recreational areas, and a strong sense of community.

Vitalia Palm Jumeirah Residences epitomize a blend of timeless elegance and modern luxury on the iconic Palm Jumeirah in Dubai. Designed by Pinnacle Developers, this exclusive project offers a lifestyle of unparalleled sophistication and vibrancy along the picturesque shores of the island.

Situated in a prime location on the Palm Jumeirah, Vitalia allows easy access to Dubaiâs vibrant lifestyle, shopping destinations, fine dining restaurants, pristine beaches, and championship golf courses. Residents can indulge in a myriad of experiences, from exploring the city's iconic landmarks to enjoying the vibrant culinary scene.

developer.name: Pinnacle A K S Real Estate Development

The Community Sports Arena at Dubai Sports City, developed by Aqua Properties, is a residential complex that combines contemporary luxury with urban living. The complex offers studios, one, two, and three-bedroom apartments, each designed with care to provide a comfortable and sophisticated living experience.

This impressive project features a 22-story plus roof structure, with four basement levels and ground area, tailored to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Designed for those who enjoy an active lifestyle, the arena offers world-class sports facilities, including an infinity pool, a fully equipped gym, and access to championship golf courses at Dubai Sports City and international sports academies. From the infinity pool and rooftop garden to the kids' play area and running tracks, Mackerel Tower provides a perfect balance of relaxation and recreation for residents of all ages. Welcome home to a world where life flows seamlessly, where luxury meets comfort, and where every day is filled with the promise of a truly exceptional waterfront lifestyle.

Alba Tower offers an exceptional living experience with a variety of one and two-bedroom apartments, designed to cater to different lifestyles and preferences. The elegant exterior of the building showcases contemporary architectural design, making it a standout landmark in the area.

Inside Alba Tower, residents will find apartments that epitomize luxury and comfort. Each unit features private balconies or terraces, modern kitchen cabinets and countertops, fully-tiled bathrooms, en-suites, and guest toilets, wherever applicable. Double-glazed windows ensure a quiet living environment, while high-speed internet access is available through satellite master antennas and fiber optic connections. Central air conditioning, vanity units, and mirrors enhance the overall living experience, providing a perfect blend of style and functionality.

Located in Al Satwa, Alba Tower offers close proximity to Dubai's main attractions and easy access to major roads. Residents can enjoy world-class amenities including private parking for each unit, a swimming pool, gymnasium, kids' play areas, retail areas, shaded seating areas, landscaped gardens, BBQ areas, and covered parking. With 40 one-bedroom apartments and 32 two-bedroom apartments, Alba Tower is designed to meet the needs of modern urban living, making it an ideal choice for those seeking luxury and convenience in the heart of Dubai.

properties.name: One Residence
properties.description:
ONE RESIDENCE is more than just a luxury address; it is a lifestyle choice that promises excitement and fulfillment. Situated in the vibrant heart of Downtown Dubai, this prestigious development provides a rare opportunity to invest in a globally renowned destination.

Imagine living in close proximity to iconic landmarks such as the Burj Khalifa and the Dubai Mall, immersing yourself in a dynamic urban environment. With an array of Michelin-starred restaurants, top-tier theaters, upscale shopping outlets, and buzzing nightlife options within reach, ONE RESIDENCE ensures that you are always at the epicenter of the action.

Comprising a total of 453 opulent residences spread across 30 floors, ONE RESIDENCE offers a diverse range of layouts to cater to various lifestyles. From charming studios to spacious one and two-bedroom units, as well as exclusive penthouses, there is a perfect home for everyone within this development.

The meticulous selection of premium materials such as beige tones, brass, and copper infuse a sense of luxury into the interiors of ONE RESIDENCE. Bold textures and patterns add a touch of vibrancy, creating a sophisticated and inviting ambiance for residents to revel in.

The exterior facade of ONE RESIDENCE is a testament to architectural elegance, featuring a harmonious blend of textures and materials. Floor-to-ceiling windows offer breathtaking panoramic vistas of the cityscape, while the sleek bronze-finished balconies with minimalist railings heighten the building's vertical profile and magnificence. Luxurious copper panels catch the sunlight, casting warm hues and adding a captivating visual allure to the structure.

Each residence within ONE RESIDENCE is a masterpiece of design, seamlessly fusing contemporary aesthetics with lavish finishes. Indulge in a sanctuary of comfort and style, tailored to the preferences of those who have a penchant for the finer things in life. ONE RESIDENCE is a unique collection of visionary homes that epitomize modern luxury at its best.

properties.name: Aurora by Binghatti
properties.description:
Nestled in the vibrant Jumeirah Village Circle, Aurora by Binghatti is a striking testament to architectural innovation inspired by the ethereal Northern Lights. This premium 5-story residential complex stands as a beacon of contemporary design and elegance. Every facet of its exterior is meticulously crafted to exude subtle sophistication and modern flair, making it a landmark of refined living.

Inside Aurora, the design philosophy is centered on evoking a sense of wonder and luxury. The apartments range from studios to 1- and 2-bedroom units, each thoughtfully designed with high-quality turnkey finishes, furnished kitchens, and ample parking spaces. Residents can expect the finest details in every corner, whispering opulence and creating a serene yet luxurious atmosphere. Prices for these exquisite residences include high-quality turnkey finishes, fully furnished kitchens, and dedicated parking spaces, ensuring a seamless move-in experience.

Aurora by Binghatti promises an unparalleled living experience through its exclusive collection of lifestyle features. With 275 residences, including 92 studios, 163 one-bedroom, and 20 two-bedroom apartments, this project offers a unique blend of comfort and style. Located in JVC, it provides easy access to the best that Dubai has to offer, making it a prime choice for those seeking luxury and convenience.

properties.name: Ghaff Land Residence
properties.description:
Ghaff Land Residence, developed by Arabian Gulf Properties and managed by Refine Development Management, is located in Dubai Studio City. The project rises 9 floors above ground and includes a ground floor, first floor, rooftop, and eight residential levels. Its modern architectural style emphasizes clean lines and practical layouts, designed to create a balance between comfort and functionality.

The residence features 168 units, offering studios, 1BR, 2BR, and duplex 2BR apartments. Homes come with carefully planned layouts that optimize space and natural light. Residents benefit from partial furnishing with essential elements, while the interiors are finished with modern materials to ensure a comfortable living environment.

Amenities include a swimming pool, gym, multipurpose recreation area, and a childrenâs play zone. The development is within 5 minutes of First Avenue Mall and Royal Grammar School Guildford, as well as 12â20 minutes from Mediclinic Parkview Hospital and DWC Airport. This combination of facilities and accessibility makes Ghaff Land Residence a suitable option for families and professionals alike.

properties.name: Manchester Tower
properties.description:
Manchester Tower is a residential complex comprising 336 apartments with one, two, or three bedrooms, strategically located in the Dubai Marina area. The project is owned by Manchester Real Estate Group and features a 30-story tower that stands 127 meters tall. The construction of the tower was completed in mid-2007.

The apartments are fully equipped with all necessary living conveniences. The layouts include bedrooms, multiple bathrooms, a living room, a kitchen, and a spacious balcony that offers views of the surrounding area. The living space in these apartments ranges from 340 to 1391 sq. ft (31.5 to 129.22 sq. m). The building provides 24-hour security and offers various services for its residents. On-site facilities include a barbecue area, cafÃ©, parking, and a children's playground. The local area boasts several parks and fitness centers. Additionally, a pool and a gym are located on the rooftop for the exclusive use of Manchester Tower's residents. Safety is ensured with an alarm system, intercom devices, and fire detectors. Pet ownership is permitted.

properties.name: Neila
properties.description:
Located in the coveted Al Furjan community in Dubai, Azizi Neila is a premier residential project offering a perfect blend of modern living and urban convenience. This dynamic development showcases a range of studio and 1-bedroom apartments designed with stylish exteriors and interiors to cater to the discerning needs of residents.

Within the vibrant neighborhood of Al Furjan, Neila is a cultural hotspot that fosters a family-friendly environment, ideal for individuals and families alike. The community is rapidly expanding, providing residents with exciting opportunities for social interaction and networking.

One of the key highlights of Neila is its strategic location along the metro line, offering seamless connectivity for hassle-free commutes and easy access to various parts of the city. Residents can enjoy the tranquility of peaceful urban living while still being within reach of Dubai's bustling city life.

Moreover, Neila boasts excellent connectivity to the city's major highways, ensuring smooth transitions for those who commute for work or leisure. The project is conveniently located near prominent shopping destinations such as Ibn Battuta Mall and Dubai Marina Mall, providing residents with a plethora of retail and leisure options right at their doorstep.

Additionally, Neila's proximity to key business hubs like Media City, Internet City, and Expo City Dubai further enhances its appeal, making it an attractive option for professionals seeking a well-connected and vibrant neighborhood to call home. With a focus on convenience, comfort, and community living, Azizi Neila exemplifies the essence of contemporary urban lifestyle in one of Dubai's most sought-after residential communities.

properties.name: Anantara South Palm Jumeirah
properties.description:
Anantara is a Sanskrit word meaning "without end", which truly embodies the freedom, movement and harmony that is the spirit of Anantara South Palm Jumeirah. Each Anantara home captures inspiration from the rich cultural traditions, historical heritage and natural beauty of the area.

Anantara South Palm Jumeirah is located on the outer crescent of the famous Palm Jumeirah island. Surrounded by lush gardens and a crystal clear lagoon, connected by winding, palm-lined paths, the beautifully appointed rooms and villas are uniquely designed with a contemporary Asian flair.

properties.name: Skyscape Altius
properties.description:
Elevate to a great new level of luxury at Skyscape Altius, a 85-story residential complex that exudes exceptional craftsmanship. Each moment at Skyscape Altius is a celebration of the perfect harmony between the peaceful lagoon and the vibrant cityscape, offering residents a taste of unparalleled beauty at the pinnacle of luxury living.

Embrace a waterfront lifestyle of beauty and tranquility as you admire the clear waters and captivating city views from the poised tower. Skyscape Altius is designed to cater to elite residents who seek exclusivity, offering a selection of 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, and 3 bedroom apartments that provide an extraordinary vantage point above the city skyline.

Experience urban luxury at its finest with the sleek design, premium finishes, and sophisticated ambiance that define Skyscape Altius. From the opulent lobby to the serene waterfront terrace, every corner of the complex radiates unparalleled comfort and indulgence. Situated in the prestigious Sobha Hartland - II, this residential complex sets new standards of elegance in the heart of Dubai.

With expansive windows that frame the captivating city skyline, Skyscape Altius invites residents to marvel at iconic landmarks and urban landscapes that evolve throughout the day. Whether it's the glittering lights of downtown at night or the serene morning fog, each scene offers a captivating narrative of city living that unfolds before your eyes.

Luxury seamlessly blends with the tranquility of waterfront living at Skyscape Altius, creating a sanctuary where opulence meets serenity. Embrace the gentle sounds of the waves and the breathtaking views that surround you, enveloped in an atmosphere of refined indulgence. Every moment spent here is a symphony of luxury, echoing the serene rhythm of waterfront life.

The panoramic views from Skyscape Altius awaken a profound sense of serenity, inviting residents to immerse themselves in the beauty of tranquil waters and endless horizons. Each vista tells a story of peace and invites the soul to embrace nature's tranquility. In this sanctuary of beauty, every gaze is a journey into the depths of serene bliss, offering a truly transformative residential experience at Skyscape Altius.

properties.name: The Autograph S Series
properties.description:
Nestled in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle, The Autograph S Series by Green Group is a masterfully crafted residential complex designed for those seeking a sophisticated lifestyle. Boasting an exquisite blend of contemporary architecture and luxurious amenities, this premium development sets a new standard for upscale living in Dubai.

Each apartment within The Autograph S Series is a showcase of impeccable design and meticulous attention to detail. From high-end finishes to spacious layouts, every aspect of these homes has been carefully curated to provide residents with a haven of comfort and elegance. State-of-the-art appliances further enhance the living experience, ensuring convenience and efficiency in every corner of these meticulously crafted living spaces.

Beyond the apartments themselves, residents of The Autograph S Series are treated to a wealth of exclusive amenities that cater to their every need. From a fully equipped fitness center where health and wellness take center stage, to a lavish swimming pool ideal for relaxation and recreation, every detail has been thoughtfully considered to create an unparalleled living environment. The meticulously landscaped gardens surrounding the property offer a serene escape from the bustle of city life, allowing residents to connect with nature without leaving the comfort of their home.

Green Groupâs commitment to sustainable luxury is evident throughout The Autograph S Series, where eco-friendly practices and premium living converge seamlessly. This visionary development not only provides exceptional residences but also fosters a sense of community and belonging among its residents. Whether it's the deluxe interiors, the world-class amenities, or the vibrant surroundings, every element of The Autograph S Series redefines the concept of modern urban living in Dubai.

In conclusion, The Autograph S Series stands as a testament to Green Group's dedication to creating spaces where luxury, comfort, and sustainability harmoniously coexist. With its unparalleled design, premium amenities, and prime location, this residential complex offers a lifestyle of sophistication and refinement for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

properties.name: Sky Suites
properties.description:
Jumeirah Village Circle or JVC as its often referred to represents an intricately planned mixed use community. It features a mix of contemporary apartments, townhouses, and villas, developed by a wide number of properties developers.

Sky Suites, an exquisite haven of sophistication nestled in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle, developed by Peace Homes Group. We invite you to embark on a journey of extraordinary living.

Sky Suites is designed to offer a superior quality of life. With ample spaces to hangout and unwind, residents can enjoy a true sense of community. Fully furnished hotel apartments, German appliances & Italian fittings, 8000 sqft lobby with valet parking service, Restaurant and Business lounge, Private pool and cinema.

properties.name: Marina Views
properties.description:
Marina Views is a luxurious residential haven nestled in the coveted Rashid Yachts & Marina community, complemented with modern amenities, beautiful scenery,and access to exciting local hotspots. It is the perfect place to relax and explore in proximity to some of Dubai's most exciting attractions.

Immerse yourself in the rich history of Dubai and indulge inÂ the convenience of being just a stone's throw away fromÂ Downtown. Marina Views offers unrivalled proximity to theÂ city's most renowned landmarks. Indulge in the captivatingÂ blend of timeless traditions and modern dynamism thatÂ Dubai has to offer.

properties.name: Peace Lagoons
properties.description:
Discover the unparalleled luxury of Peace Lagoons, a residential complex where sophistication and innovation harmoniously coexist. Nestled in the heart of this exquisite development is a stunning lagoon, offering a serene oasis exclusively for residents to enjoy.

The apartments at Peace Lagoons are thoughtfully designed to provide the ultimate in luxury living. Choose from a selection of studio, 1, and 2-bedroom options, each boasting its own private pool for relaxation and leisure. Step into the enchanting lobby, where elegance and style greet you at every turn.

Indulge in the array of amenities available within the complex, including a kids' play area, volleyball court, gymnasium, beach pool, yoga area, and a 30,000 sqft shopping mall. Immerse yourself in the tranquil waters of the lagoon, complete with sun beds and artificial rain for a truly unique experience.

The master bedroom at Peace Lagoons is a sanctuary unto itself, featuring premium Italian ceramics and exquisite furnishings. Open the doors to your private balcony, where an exclusive swimming pool awaits, enhancing your living space and offering a seamless blend of indoor and outdoor living.

At Peace Lagoons, every detail has been carefully curated to provide a serene and restful environment for residents to enjoy. Experience the perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and nature at Dubai's first lagoon apartment complex. Welcome home to Peace Lagoons, where luxury living has reached new heights.

properties.name: Bayshore at Creek Beach
properties.description:
Following the overwhelming success of BREEZE and SUNSET at Creek Beach, we are delighted to present BAYSHORE, a prime opportunity in Dubai Creek Harbour.

The perfect harmony of a stand-out location and iconic views.

Elegant apartments with awe-inspiring views of the Dubai Creek Tower. Sail, dine and enjoy the creative scene at purpose-built social hubs; all as you live just moments away from the blissful serenity of the Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary. Welcome to BAYSHORE.

A relaxing getaway among palm trees and cabanas, at the heart of Dubai Creek Harbour. An infinity pool with a visual connection to the Creek, and a host of dining venues bordering the shoreline. Imagine you and your loved ones, right here.

properties.name: 11 Hills Park
properties.description:
Located in Dubai Science Park, the 11 Park Hills residential complex by Town X offers modern living across 18 residential floors with a total of 558 apartments. As one of the prominent projects in the area, this development boasts a prime location close to various amenities and attractions. Residents can enjoy easy access to key points on the map, making commuting a breeze and allowing for convenient exploration of nearby landmarks. Immerse yourself in the vibrant community of 11 Park Hills and experience a blend of comfort, style, and urban convenience in the heart of Dubai.

The location provides unobstructed access to first-class schools, modern hospitals and a wide range of family-friendly amenities. Discover the perfect balance of comfort and convenient services at 11 Hills Park.

Immerse yourself in the beauty of the world around you, admiring the breathtaking view of the lush terrace, a green oasis ideal for a moment's reflection. This green haven of tranquility is the perfect place for privacy.

properties.name: Urban Life Residences
properties.description:
Urban Life Residences is a 20-storey high-rise building being developed in Business Bay, an address that redefines the essence of urban modernity in Dubai. This unique residential development offers studios, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom apartments. The design of the apartments is tasteful and depicts the highest standards of living.

The studio units are efficiently smart and stylish and they range from 396 square feet to 518 square feet. 1-bedroom apartments, with 792 to 1,228 square feet, provide ample design to maximize comfort and convenience. The family or those who like huge living spaces can find the 2-bedroom units ranging between 1,607 and 1,797 square feet. The floor plans are futuristic, offering a feeling of openness and space, while the interior designs are contemporary, elegant, and tasteful. With airy layouts and modern design elements, each apartment is sophisticated and comfortable.

This project is located right at a much-appreciated residential hotspot and is quite suitable for business professionals. From this location, you can quickly reach many important landmarks in the city, viz. 3 minutes to the Dubai Canal Promenade and 11 minutes to Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall. Close connectivity to major highways and Sheikh Zayed Road allows one to access the rest of the city by a 9-minute trip and reach Jumeirah Beach in 10 minutes; the Mall of the Emirates and Dubai Marina Walk are 21 minutes away.

A host of amenities makes life easier for the residents at this project. To begin with, there are three parking floors that provide ample space for vehicles. Those who enjoy fitness and relaxation will be interested in a jogging track, well-equipped gym, swimming pool, spa, and sauna. Open gardens provide a serene getaway amidst all the bustle of the city, while the movie theater and game room give the option to be entertained right at home. Plus, a dedicated kids' play area and wide social spaces meet the demands of modern families. Also, the building has an office and coworking spaces for busy professionals. Round-the-clock security and concierge services will offer a peaceful living experience.

properties.name: Takaya
properties.description:
Takaya in Dubai Motor City is the latest and majestically planned mixed-use development by Union Properties with expensive apartments, villas and townhouses. Spanning over the 2 million square feet of gross built-up area, this grand project is the grand landmark of the community. Witness the breathtaking views of the iconic Dubai Autodrome and the bustling greenery of the locality.

The ideal location within the most coveted zone of the city, this significantly crafted development exemplifies the latest definition of contemporary and innovative luxury. This mega development comes under the most sought-after collaboration of Union with Octa Properties. The 55000 square feet of retail area with pocket gardens and world-class amenities ensure upscale community experiences for elites. From low-rises townhouses to the apartments and villas in the mid-rises building, this development offers something to everyone that caters to the requirements and desires of the people.

properties.name: Ellington House
properties.description: Ellington House is a stylish 12-storey building featuring high-end 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartments. With 69 1-bedroom, 64 2-bedroom, and 17 3-bedroom apartments, the development offers a total of 150 exquisite units, all among the finest apartments for sale in Dubai. Ellington House also features a ground floor with a lavish lobby and an alluring podium floor. Each unit also comes with a gorgeous balcony on which you can enjoy spectacular panoramic views of the surrounding natural scenery.

properties.name: Blossom 76 By Tranquil
properties.description:
When designing Blossom76, no expense was spared in creating a building that was exceptional, both inside and out. Rising majestically amidst the city skyline, this architectural masterpiece in District 17, JVC, boasts a regal stature of Ground (Retail) + 4P + 16 + RF, adorned with 111 exclusive residences. From exquisite studios to palatial 2-bedroom suites featuring private plunge pools, each dwelling is a testament to unrivalled grandeur.

Finished with high-quality claddings and glass, the innovative design simply exudes class. Most of the apartments enjoy excellent views of the community and surroundings through large-picture windows.

Once you step into the apartments at Blossom76, you will appreciate how much has been invested into creating an environment that is truly out of the ordinary. Each apartment is a masterpiece of high design, exemplary standards and finishes. The apartments feature a modern open-plan layout, giving a real sense of spaciousness to the living areas. Using only the finest finishes, the apartments are beautifully appointed with contemporary floorings and stylish fittings. The fully-fitted kitchens and master bathrooms come with exquisite fittings, on par with international standards. Itâs a dream home designed for the ultimate in urban living.

properties.name: Havelock Heights
properties.description:
Havelock Heights is a prestigious residential complex brought to life by AA & HMB Real Estate Development, offering an extraordinary living experience within the vibrant Jumeirah Village Circle. Boasting 25 stories, this freehold property presents a selection of generously proportioned studios, 1 to 2-bedroom apartments, and lavish 2 & 3-bedroom duplexes.

Conveniently situated, Havelock Heights ensures that residents have seamless access to essential community amenities, including shopping centers, dining establishments, schools, and healthcare services. The strategic location enriches the lifestyle of its inhabitants by placing all necessities within close reach.

Residents can indulge in a plethora of recreational facilities within this soaring architectural masterpiece surrounded by impeccably landscaped gardens and alluring pool spaces. The modern design and opulent features of Havelock Heights at JVC establish a resort-style ambiance, transforming daily living into a perpetual retreat.

Renowned for their commitment to excellence and timely completion, AA & HMB Real Estate Development is poised to introduce another exceptional property to Dubaiâs real estate landscape with Havelock Heights. Designed to redefine contemporary communal living, this project is primed to stand out in the market. Discover a new standard of upscale living at HMB Havelock Heights, where luxury and convenience harmonize in one of Dubai's most desirable neighborhoods.

properties.name: Verdana 5 Residences
properties.description:
Verdana 5, nestled in the lush expanse of Dubai Investments Park (DIP), epitomizes luxury living with a contemporary edge. This high-end residential community is designed for those seeking a lavish lifestyle within armâs reach of Dubai's main attractions. Verdana 5 offers a diverse mix of 271 townhouses and 392 apartment units, each featuring state-of-the-art design and built to the highest international standards.

The community is surrounded by a myriad of facilities, including parks, schools, mosques, and retail centers, providing a holistic environment for residents. The focus on extensive landscaping and the adoption of environmentally friendly policies underline the commitment to creating a sustainable and aesthetically pleasing habitat.

Residents of Verdana 5 can enjoy easy access to a variety of amenities, ensuring a comfortable and convenient lifestyle. The development's strategic location in DIP makes it one of the most sought-after addresses in Dubai, promising an exclusive retreat with a focus on green living and modern comforts.

properties.name: Mansory Residences by AMAAL
properties.description:
A groundbreaking collaboration that brings together Amaalâs expertise in real estate with MANSORYâs legacy of luxury craftsmanship. Together, we are reimagining what it means to call a space home, where beauty is matched by performance, and every detail serves a purpose.

This is more than a place to live. It is the beginning of a new kind of community, where thoughtful design encourages meaningful connection, refined craftsmanship creates a sense of belonging, and every element is curated to reflect the aspirations of those who value elevated living.

MANSORY Residences by AMAAL captures the essence of a true icon. Bold, refined, and unmistakable.

Rooted in MANSORYâs legacy of performance and craftsmanship, every line and surface reflects its signature design language. A fusion of strength and elegance, reimagined as a landmark.

Defined as a new pinnacle of architectural presence, MANSORY Residences embodies a fusion of bold form and technical mastery. Every detail, from sharp contours to carbon-inspired patterns, reflects the brandâs design DNA.

This is architecture shaped by performance, crafted with precision, and elevated to become an iconic.

properties.name: Milos
properties.description:
Welcome to Milos Residences, nestled in the heart of Dubai Land Residence Complex (DLRC), offers luxurious 1,2 & 3 bedroom. DLRC is a location where everything is easily accessible, including Business Bay, Downtown and the new Al Maktoum InternationaI Airport. Every space in Milos is thoughtfully designed, life here is centered around you. And there's a little something for everyone. Its located just a stone's throw away from world class amenities like AI-Habtoor Polo Resort, Dubai Outlet Mall, Sheikh Zayed University, SQ7 Equestrian Club, Fazza Square Shooting Range.

Milos offers a unique blend of modern elegance and natural serenity, with stunning poolside balconies and terraces that provide a perfect retreat from the bustling city life. Each detail of our building has been meticulously crafted to create a harmonious blend of indoor and outdoor living spaces, allowing residents to enjoy the beauty of Dubai skyline from the comfort of their own home. An outdoor cinema, a gym, a swimming pool and a kids' play area, here everything is within the tower.

properties.name: Binghatti Apex
properties.description:
Binghatti Apex stands as a landmark development in the vibrant JVC neighborhood, crafted by the renowned Binghatti developers. This architectural gem ascends 45 stories, offering an array of elegant studios and opulent one-bedroom apartments. The structure also integrates office spaces spread across four dedicated floors.

The building's exterior showcases a distinctive design that merges modern aesthetics with traditional Middle Eastern motifs, highlighted by expansive glass panels that enhance its distinctive architecture. Inside, the contemporary interiors are finished with premium materials, exuding luxury and sophistication.

Binghatti Apex provides a comprehensive array of amenities tailored for leisure and active lifestyles. The complex features a fully equipped gym, tennis court, jogging paths, and an expansive swimming pool for fitness aficionados. Families will appreciate the childrenâs playground and pool, while all residents can enjoy the tranquility of gazebos, recreational spots, and specialized outdoor areas for yoga and aerobics.

Strategically located, Binghatti Apex offers superb connectivity. It is situated near Al Khail Road, providing swift access to Dubaiâs key locations. The Mall of Emirates is just a 15-minute drive, and other iconic destinations like Burj Al Arab, Dubai Marina, Downtown Dubai, and Dubai Mall are within a 20-minute radius. Both Dubai International Airport and Al Maktoum International Airport can be reached in about 30 minutes, making this complex a prime choice for residents and investors alike.

properties.name: Minati Homes
properties.description:
Minati Homes by Januss Real Estate Developers is a 17-story residential building located in the vibrant Al Furjan community of Dubai. The project is a harmonious blend of contemporary design and functionality, with its sleek architecture and elegant facades that perfectly complement the surrounding urban landscape. Designed with an emphasis on quality living, it creates a welcoming atmosphere for modern lifestyles.

The apartments at Minati Homes range in layouts to suit diverse needs, from studios to spacious multi-bedroom units. Interiors are flooded with natural light and feature top-quality finishes, seamlessly integrating indoor and outdoor spaces for a wholesome living experience. With amenities such as a state-of-the-art gymnasium, a swimming pool with sunbeds and canopies, a shaded yoga area, and co-working spaces, the project fosters both relaxation and productivity.

Situated in Al Furjan, residents benefit from excellent connectivity and proximity to key areas of Dubai, while also enjoying a family-friendly environment enriched by lush greenery and community-focused spaces.

properties.name: Skyscape Aura
properties.description:
Introducing Skyscape Aura, the latest jewel of the crown. As the sequel to Skyscape Avenue, its unveiling heralds sophistication and grandeur. With its sleek design and commanding presence, Skyscape Aura captivates with unparalleled charm.

Welcome to the new era where every silhouette is infused with the spirit of architectural excellence.

At Skyscape Aura, every glance is an ode to the harmony between the caresses of the lagoon and glamour of Dubai Downtown, a testament to the unparalleled beauty that graces the horizon.

Each vantage point offers an unparalleled panorama, seamlessly blending the majesty of waterfront vistas. Gazing outwards, one is greeted by the tranquil expanse of the waterfront, where the gentle ripples of the water body mirror the hues of the sky, painting a picture of serene elegance.

Elegance finds its zenith at Skyscape Aura where elite residents revel in the allure of its exclusivity. Residents can choose from an array of 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5 and 3 bed homes, offering an extraordinary vantage point above the city skyline.

Skyscape Aura epitomizes urban luxury with its sleek design and premium finishes, setting new standards of sophistication. From the opulent lobby to the serene waterfront terrace, every corner exudes unparalleled comfort and indulgence. Experience waterfront living at its finest in the heart of the Sobha Hartland - II.

properties.name: Riva Residence
properties.description:
Riva Residence in Dubai Maritime City offers a combination of luxury and convenience adapted to a modern lifestyle. Located in Dubai's seaside district, this Vakson Group complex features spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Each apartment is distinguished by high-quality finishes, a fully equipped kitchen and large windows providing maximum natural light and a view of the embankment, which gives the apartment elegance and functionality.

The Riva Residence complex offers a wide range of amenities aimed at providing comfort and relaxation, making it an ideal choice for families and professionals. It offers residents an infinity pool, a special children's pool and a health club with the most modern equipment. The Vakson Riva Residence also has a gym, a lounge area, a multi-purpose room, a barbecue area and a children's playground, which creates a favorable family atmosphere. For professionals, a well-equipped business center provides a workplace close to home. In addition, the project pays special attention to outdoor recreation with landscaped walking alleys and green spaces, which is in harmony with the coastal environment of the maritime city of Dubai.

Dubai Maritime Center is a growing hub strategically located near Port Rashid and providing easy access to major urban amenities. Residents of Dubai Maritime City Apartments will find many shops and restaurants nearby, and Port Rashid and Deira have shopping malls such as Dubai Mall, Ibn Battuta Mall and City Walk, which cater to a variety of retail and entertainment needs. A variety of restaurants - from traditional Emirati to upscale international, especially in the Port Rashid area - make Riva Residence one of the best projects in Dubai.

properties.name: Verve City Walk
properties.description:
Welcome to an elevated lifestyle with an exclusive collection of residences that transcend the boundaries of conventional architecture. Every aspect of the design is an ode to the interplay between light, shadow, and space. Epitomising elegance, this residential landmark offers a distinctive urban experience defined by upscale interiors, lush landscaping, outdoor amenities, and awe-inspiring views.

Situated along Al Safa Street, this coveted address offers residents easy access to well-established destinations and iconic landmarks in Dubai through major highways and road networks. Just 10 minutes from the pristine shores of Jumeirah Beach and 5 minutes from the vibrant energy of Downtown Dubai, this prime location provides an unparalleled living experience where residents can enjoy refined elegance, right in the heart of City Walk.

Verve City Walk is an architectural masterpiece that beats to the unique rhythm of urban life. From a sleek, modern penthouse boasting panoramic skyline views to bespoke cut-outs and elegant apartments, every residence harmonises with the spirit of the metropolis. These exquisite homes feature state-of-the-art amenities with thoughtful design, offering a lifestyle perfectly attuned to the cityâs vibrant energy.

Verve City Walk presents an unparalleled sky-living experience with its two elegant high-rise towers, seamlessly connected by a sophisticated podium and an exclusive retail hub.

properties.name: W Residences at Dubai Harbour
properties.description:

The convenient location of Port De La Mer allows residents to easily access popular destinations like La Mer and City Walk within 10 minutes. With excellent road connectivity to the city's airports and major shopping malls, residents can seamlessly explore Dubai and beyond.

The project's central podium, bustling piazzas, and interconnected bridges enhance the sense of community and provide residents with inviting open spaces to socialize and unwind. La Cote epitomizes a laid-back lifestyle amidst an urban landscape, offering a retreat where residents can relax and rejuvenate in a tranquil environment.

The building, classified as a mid-rise residential structure, is set to redefine upscale urban living with its prime location and top-notch amenities. Construction began in June 2022, and the anticipated handover date is March 2023, creating a buzz of anticipation among prospective buyers and investors.

Situated on plot 6488657, Bliss Homes is being constructed by the renowned Chirag Contracting, known for their quality craftsmanship and timely delivery of projects. The building is designed to blend seamlessly with the surrounding landscape and skyline, offering a sense of sophistication and tranquility to its residents.

Within close proximity to schools, shops, and various leisure outlets, Bliss Homes provides convenience and accessibility for its future occupants. The project is poised to become a desirable residential address in DubaiLand, attracting those seeking a harmonious blend of comfort, style, and modernity in their living space.

Stay tuned for construction updates, milestones, and further details on this promising residential development as it progresses towards completion and handover in the coming months. Bliss Homes is truly set to offer a blissful living experience in the vibrant city of Dubai.

The rather wide podium of the Trinity building will include a large public area with many amenities and services.The location of the Trinity residential complex is very good. Highgate International School is located very close by. The nearest supermarket, Nesto, is just a couple of minutes' walk away. Also nearby are the My City Centre Al Barsha shopping Mall with more than 25 shops and 110 parking spaces, including an outdoor restaurant, and the Dubai Hills Mall (5 minutes drive) with an area of 282,000 square meters with more than 650 shops.

Trinity is an excellent choice for those who want to live in luxury and comfort in one of the most prestigious areas of Dubai.

properties.name: Aeternitas

The most prestigious watchmakers in the world create a lifestyle worthy of the chosen ones â it is an extraordinary experience unlike any other. It is a lifestyle created for connoisseurs, where every waking moment is an ode to life.

London Gate and Franck Muller will build a 450-meter skyscraper in the Dubai Marina area. The impressive design will be named Aeternitas after one of the company's most sophisticated watches with 36 complications and 1,483 components. When completed, it will be the tallest residential tower, the tallest branded residential tower in Dubai and the tallest residential clock tower in the world.

The project will redefine the city skyline while setting international standards for luxury living with spectacular views.

The clock tower will be based in Dubai Marina with a total height of 450 meters high, 5 star luxurious amenities including pools, squash courts, cigar lounge, cinema rooms, kids play area, etc.

properties.name: The Orchard Place
properties.description:

Located in the popular family community of Jumeirah Village Circle, this exclusive residential complex is a project by Peak Summit Real Estate Development.Â 

The complex consists of two towers of varying heights, offering studios, 1-2 bedroom apartments, duplexes, and three-bedroom penthouses for sale.Inspired by the world-famous skyscrapers of New York, The Orchard Place is a cosmopolitan project situated at the heart of modern life. The property is expected to be ready for occupancy in the third quarter of 2026.Â 

The complex will include two towers, 23 and 30 stories high, linked by four podium levels and a basement floor. A total of 416 residences are available for purchase, ranging in size from 48 sq. m to 307 sq. m.The complex also features lofts - two-level apartments with a spacious living room, dining area, and open-plan kitchen on the first floor, and a bedroom with a dressing room and bathroom on the second.Â 

Among the penthouses, there are standard types, lofts, and duplexes. Regardless of the layout, all residences come with balconies or terraces, open or semi-open kitchens, convenient built-in wardrobes in the bedrooms.Â 

Some options come with a laundry room and an en-suite bathroom in the bedroom. Duplexes and penthouses additionally have a separate maid's room and a private pool.

The interiors of The Orchard Place are designed according to the overall concept of the project: a comfortable, peaceful place in the center of a bustling city. The residences use sophisticated, exquisite materials from global brands. Ceiling heights vary from 2.5 m to 6.2 m in the living rooms of the penthouses.

360 Riverside Crescent offers a range of apartments ranging from 57 to 102 mÂ². This is a place where nature becomes your home and life takes on new shades.

Alongside its exemplary architecture and seafront setting, Armani Beach Residences at Palm Jumeirah is distinguished by a set of amenities like no other, allowing residents to experience a truly ultra-luxury lifestyle. The terrace gardens are perfect for those who enjoy outdoor living, providing a tranquil space to relax and unwind while soaking in the breathtaking beachfront views.Life at 330 Riverside Crescent is about embracing the tranquility and beauty of waterfront living.Â

It's a gateway to a lifestyle of serenity and beauty, where every moment is a testament to the joy of waterfront living. With its unique design, unparalleled amenities, and prime location, 330 Riverside Crescent is truly a residential masterpiece that caters to those who seek an extraordinary living experience.
