The spectacular Churchill Residency stands tall at 244 meters, while the elegant Churchill Executive reaches a height of 200 meters. Offering a total of 618 apartments ranging from one to three bedrooms, Churchill Residency provides a luxurious living experience for residents.

Residents can enjoy a range of top-notch facilities including a health club complete with sauna, steam room, Jacuzzi, and gym, a childrenâs play area, and a tranquil prayer room. The two towers, sharing a common podium, create a harmonious living and working environment.

Conveniently located along the picturesque Dubai Water Canal, Churchill Towers offers easy access to various key destinations. Driving times to popular spots such as Dubai Mall, Palm Jumeirah, Burj Al Arab, and The Walk JBR range from 10 to 25 minutes. Additionally, Dubai International Airport is just a 21-minute drive away, while the Al Maktoum International Airport can be reached in approximately 42 minutes.

With its prime location, stunning architecture, and upscale amenities, Churchill Towers provides a sophisticated lifestyle experience for residents and businesses in the heart of Dubai's bustling Business Bay district.

Located between Al Wasl Road and Sheikh Zayed Road, Central Park at City Walk offers convenient access to major landmarks in Dubai. Imagine waking up to sweeping views of lush greenery and the iconic Dubai skyline, all while being surrounded by world-class dining options, shopping centers, and entertainment venues. Celadon at Central Park provides a tranquil oasis in the heart of the city, where residents can enjoy a harmonious blend of nature and urban sophistication.

The tower with its sparkling glass facade will look spectacular against the cityscape. All apartments have high ceilings, equipped bathrooms with freestanding bathtubs and a toilet.

The building consists of 58 floors. It includes apartments with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms. All 2 and 3 bedroom apartments overlook the super-skyscraper and fountains, and the 1 bedroom apartments are Downtown Boulevard and Old Town and have incredibly beautiful panoramic views! The infrastructure of the complex includes everything necessary for a full life and recreation. properties.name: Burj Khalifa
properties.description:
The Burj Khalifa, developed by Dubai-based Emaar Properties PJSC, stands as a 'Vertical City' and 'A Living Wonder,' recognized globally as an icon by the Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat. Towering at an impressive 828 meters with over 160 habitable levels, this architectural marvel seamlessly combines art, engineering, and meticulous craftsmanship. Inaugurated on January 4, 2010, the tower holds numerous world records, including being the tallest man-made structure 1,325 days after construction began in 2004.

Constructed with 330,000 cubic meters of concrete, 39,000 tonnes of steel reinforcement, 103,000 square meters of glass, and 15,500 square meters of embossed stainless steel, the Burj Khalifa took 22 million man-hours to complete. The total built-up area spans 5.67 million square feet, comprising residential and office spaces along with the prestigious Armani Hotel Dubai and Armani Residences.

The tower boasts luxurious amenities such as multiple swimming pools, lounges, health and wellness facilities, and a public observation deck on Level 122 featuring At.mosphere, the world's highest fine dining restaurant. The Armani Hotel Dubai, with its unique dining experiences and exclusive spa and retail offerings, adds to the opulence of the residence.

The observation decks on levels 148, 125, and 124 offer breathtaking views of Dubai and its surroundings. Intricate art pieces by international and Middle Eastern artists grace the interiors, symbolizing global harmony. The Burj Khalifa truly comes to life with residents moving into The Residence and The Corporate Suites.

In addition, special events like the world's highest fireworks display marked the grand inauguration anniversary, captivating a global audience. The Residence in Burj Khalifa comprises 900 luxurious residences designed across levels 19-108, offering a prestigious lifestyle. Exclusive Sky Lobbies on Levels 43, 76, and 123, fitness facilities, and recreational rooms enhance the living experience for the privileged few who call Burj Khalifa home.

Designed to foster a family-friendly environment amid lush landscaping, Bloom Heights offers a perfect blend of modern living spaces and high-quality finishes. It's an ideal choice for those seeking a sense of community and a premium lifestyle in a vibrant setting.

properties.description:
The Alcove is a 6âstorey residential complex in the Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) area in Dubai. There are retail stores on the ground floor of the building. On the remaining floors there are 78 residential buildings â these are studios and apartments with 1 and 2 bedrooms.

The project was developed by Next Engineering Consultants. The developer was Grovy Real Estate Development. The residence was commissioned in 2018.

The residential complex has a gym, a swimming pool and a children's playground. The building has a barbecue area for outdoor recreation. The Alcove provides underground parking. Home owners and tenants can count on at least one parking space. Guests can park their cars outside the apartment complex.

The Alcove residential complex has an advantageous location. Jumeirah Village Circle is a familyâoriented community with developed infrastructure and good transport interchange.

Bus stops such as Tuscan Residences, Mirabella Villas 2 and Judi Palace Apartments 1 are within walking distance of the apartment. The nearest metro stations are First Abu Dhabi Bank and Mall of the Emirates, which are a 10-minute walk away.

properties.name: Ag Square
properties.description:
AG Square is a new residential complex from a major developer Ag Properties. The object is located in the prestigious Dubiland district, which is known for its developed infrastructure, excellent location and calm, measured atmosphere.

The 19-storey residential complex is designed in the best traditions of the premium class. Its external rigor is perfectly combined with the comfortable environment inside the building, and the windows offer stunning views of the vast Dubai.

properties.name: Address The Bay
properties.description: Address Residences The Bay is a new advancement by Emaar Properties that offers 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom apartments at Emaar Beachfront, Dubai. This high-rise 60-storey tower comes with a collection of luxury hotel suites and residential apartments with six podium levels for parking and family fun.

properties.name: Address Harbour Point
properties.description: The premium class complex is equipped with numerous amenities, the purpose of which is to provide local property owners with a variety of opportunities for recreation, entertainment, as well as continuous improvement of their own physical and psychological condition. On the territory of the project, they can exercise in the gym with a large selection of equipment, relax in the sauna and steam room, swim in the pool, attend spa treatments, buy goods in the store and spend time with loved ones in local cafes and restaurants. The complex is a child-friendly space, so there are special facilities for children, which include playgrounds and a shallow pool.

properties.name: Aces Chateau
properties.description:
Aces Chateau is an exquisite residential project situated in JVC District 11, Jumeirah Village Circle, Dubai. This five-storey Renaissance inspired building stands out in its elegant community, offering a blend of luxury and tranquility for residents looking for a sophisticated urban lifestyle.

The property boasts world-class standards in both its exterior and interior design, emanating an aura of elegance and heritage. Aces Chateau serves as an ideal residence for individuals and families seeking a vibrant yet serene living environment, coupled with top-notch amenities and facilities within a single estate.

Residents of Aces Chateau can enjoy a range of services and facilities, including a CCTV security control system, a common pool, and retail spaces, offering complete rejuvenation for body, mind, and soul. The comfortable lounge areas on the rooftop provide a relaxing space for residents to unwind and socialize.

Developed by Rijas Aces Property under its subsidiary Aces Property Ltd., Aces Chateau comprises a total of 50 units, featuring a mix of studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments as well as penthouses. The architectural design of the building by High Art Engineering Consultants embraces a French renaissance-style with plush apartments and penthouses equipped with private pools, complemented by two convenience stores within the premises.

Located in JVC District 11, Aces Chateau offers a fine selection of upscale residences with exclusive amenities and facilities, embodying a French Stucco-style architecture for an elegant living experience. The rooftop garden and BBQ areas provide additional leisure spaces for residents to enjoy quality time with family and friends while relishing scenic views of the surroundings and cityscape from their spacious balconies.

With an emphasis on privacy, security, and luxury living standards, Aces Chateau presents a convenient and viable payment plan for potential buyers seeking a prestigious residential address in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle. This development truly redefines upscale urban living, promising a harmonious blend of comfort, sophistication, and modern convenience for its discerning residents.

properties.name: Acacia At Park Heights
properties.description:
Acacia is developed by the most famous developer of UAE, Emaar, which offers dazzling sequence of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments overlooking Dubai Hills Park in Park Heights at Dubai Hills Estate. It offers an integrated lifestyle where residents can have a range of leisure amenities. This residential building featuring 477 apartments, nearby the famous restaurants, and endless shopping counters.

Emaar blends the Acacia building with beautiful parkland, where the resident can create unforgettable moments with their family. Acacia Apartments are well-located in the community of Dubai Hills Estate, an internal part of MBR City. The interior of the apartments is elegantly designed with high-quality materials. The surrounding is profound with luxury and peaceful lifestyle for their residents.

Acacia at Park Heights offers better quality aspects for individuals, couples, and families. Set around an 18-opening title green, this blended use private advancement is an awesome enclave for those looking for a completely coordinated way of life.

properties.name: 1 Residences
properties.description:
1 Residences in Wasl1 is perfectly positionedÂ alongside the lush serenity of Zabeel Park. ThisÂ gorgeous city retreat will enable residents to wakeÂ up with invigorating views, take a refreshing strollÂ or play with friends and family all while only minutes from the buzz of city life.

Life at 1 Residences promises to always excite and amaze. The dual tower complex has three connecting levels that contain a multitude of exclusive amenities and facilities including a state-of-the-art gym, 340m jogging track and a stunning outdoor swimming pool with sunbathing areas. 1 Residences is also part of the five zones of Wasl 1, putting it steps away from the central plaza, delicious fine dining restaurants, boutique retail outlets, five-star hospitality venues and thrilling entertainment hotspots.

properties.name: 17 Icon Bay
properties.description: 17 Icon Bay is a new residential building in the prestigious coastal community of Dubai Creek Harbour. The skyscraper, developed by Emaar Properties, features spacious premium-class residencies with one to three bedrooms, furniture, and household appliances. The apartments in 17 Icon Bay are suitable for both permanent residence and investments. It's an affordable opportunity to expand your investment portfolio, and preserve and grow your financial resources.

properties.name: Marriott Executive Residences
properties.description:
Marriott Executive Residences at Al Barsha South is the latest joint development of MAG Property and one of the well-known Marriott hotel brands, which offers premium apartments with 1-3 bedrooms, townhouses and penthouses of superior comfort. Enjoy your life in the natural world, where three towers with a connected podium and an oasis of pleasure and beauty are combined together to give you a life in a modern style and modern architecture.

Marriott Residence, Al Barsha South, is strategically located with views out across two of the most iconic buildings in Dubai, the Burj Al Arab and Downtown Dubai, Burj Khalifa. The property focuses on delivering a relaxed sanctuary for residents, to escape from the metropolitan lifestyle of the city.

The interior design of the building will be an inviting oasis, with layers of green and beige tones, and touches of locally distinct arabesque details, delivered delicately. Warm, contemporary interiors that focus on natural textures fabrics are used throughout the public areas and residences, with raw but rich materials such as wood, stone and leather selected for surfaces and furniture. The properties overall interior design takes influence from its neighbors; four world class golf courses and two prestigious equestrian polo club.
